name: TheOptimisticPineapple
0:
”Alexa, start the optimistic pineapple”
”Alexa, ask the optimistic pineapple how long since obama was president.”
”Alexa, ask the optimistic pineapple how long until the next presidential inauguration”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the optimistic pineapple
des: The optimistic pineapple can provide you answers to some simple questions. You can ask it how much time it has been since Barack Obama was president or how long till the next inauguration. Hopefully the information provided makes your day more fruitful!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
